list_definition.mean_english: bộ ba thanh chắn trong cricket
list_definition.definition: a hoop through which the balls are driven in the game of croquet or at which the ball is bowled in cricket.
the ground between two sets of these rods

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The wicket has dried out well.

list_definition.definition: the ending of a batsman’s period of batting

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They scored fifty runs for (the loss of) one wicket.

list_ex_of_english: He took five wickets in an innings twice.
She scored 17 runs in the competition and took 2 wickets.
He ended the subcontinental tour with 15 wickets at 35.73, and scored 70 runs at 23.33.
He bowled 5 overs but took no wickets.
Sheriyar has had an impressive career taking over 600 wickets with his fast medium seam bowling.
He scored 1,000 runs in a season eight times, took 361 catches and 13 wickets at 31.00.
An occasional medium pace bowler, he took 7 wickets at a bowling average of 32.00, with best figures of 2/27.
Ojha again took the highest of 5 wickets in this inning.
